[[Version 2.1]]
*The description of World-Shaker was changed.
**{{Color|Old description:}} Every 2 Falling Thunder attacks triggered by Bellowing Thunder will increase the DMG dealt by the next Falling Thunder <span class="bg-highlight">by 100%</span>, and will restore an additional 1 Energy to the current character.
**{{Color|New description:}} Every 2 Falling Thunder attacks triggered by Bellowing Thunder will <span class="bg-highlight">significantly</span> increase the DMG dealt by the next Falling Thunder<span class="bg-highlight">, dealing 200% of its original DMG</span>, and will restore an additional 1 Energy to the current character.
